bio.value: Lindsay McKenna is the pseudonym of award winning author, Eileen Nauman. She comes from a Navy family and her father served in WWII. She joined the U.S. Navy and served from 1964-1967. She has also been a volunteer firefighter, pioneering women as firefighters. Additionally, she was an EMT is Arizona for many years. She is a pilot and has flown many planes, including an Air Force T-38 “chase plane” while researching her book about test pilots. She is known as the “Top Gun of Women’s Military Fiction”. She is also the originator of the military adventure/romance genre. She is the bestselling women’s fiction author to release a new book exclusively through electronic medium.
